department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: The Canadian Armed Forces has a reqirement for snowmobiles in New Brunswick
description: The Canadian Armed Forces has a requirement for snowmobiles in New Brunswick for training and qualifying members on the vehicle system
full_summary:
### Tender Details
#### Tender W0501-23C035

**Project Title**: Snowmobile Rental
**Tender Reference Number**: WS4099183398
**Modification Number**: 2 of 2
**Public Release Date**: October 18, 2023

**Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (RFRO)
**Procurement Category**: Service Related (SRV)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding

**Closing Date**: November 10, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Time

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit their proposals for the rental of snowmobiles for the Canadian Armed Forces. The snowmobiles are required for training and qualifying members on the vehicle system.

**Bid Opening and Award**: The lowest bid will be selected through a competitive process.

**Trade Agreements**: The contract is subject to the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Delivery Locations**: Deliveries are required to Oromocto, New Brunswick.

**Contact Information**:

* Danny Arseneau
* Phone: N/A
* Email: [danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

For more information, please visit:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17756879?extsite=MTc3NTY4NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
